pages.title: Giant Short-Faced Hyena
pages.text: Pachycrocuta is an exinct genus of prehistoric hyenas.$(br2)Pachycrocuta first appeared during the late Miocene ($(o)Messinian, 7.2 to 5.3 million years ago$()) and became extinct during the middle Pleistocene, 400,000 years ago.

pages.title: Giant Short-Faced Hyena
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rotten_flesh$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
